snippet: The company’s Fresh & Easy food stores have remained unprofitable despite five years of investment.
abstract: British supermarket firm Tesco says it will most likely withdraw from the United States after announcing review of its Fresh & Easy food stores, which have remained unprofitable despite five years of investment.
lead_paragraph: The company’s Fresh & Easy food stores have remained unprofitable despite five years of investment.

headline.seo: Tesco Backing Away From U.S. Operations
headline.main: After Losses at Grocery Stores, Tesco to Retreat From U.S. Operations
headline.print_headline: After Losses at Grocery Stores, Tesco to Retreat From U.S. Operations
